entry.title: On My Knees, I’m Home
entry.summary:
Author: DamnSterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,046Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 69

Summary: Eddie’s been in love with Buck for years—but he’s good at hiding things, burying feelings, and pretending everything’s fine. Until one night, he just... can’t anymore. He blurts out that he wants to scene with Buck, and to his surprise, Buck says yes. What starts as one scene quickly spirals into something deeper, something neither of them are quite ready to admit out loud. Cue: seven years of pining, mutual idiocy, soft dom!Buck, emotionally constipated!Eddie, a whole lot of feelings, some very intense aftercare, and eventually realizing that sometimes, love sounds a lot like “Color?” and “Green.”

entry.title: Hunger for you
entry.summary:
Author: LunaDusktreader

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,827Chapters: 15/36Kudos: 16

Summary: Buck has always known that the chemistry between him and Eddie was undeniable, but he never imagined that a simple moment of care could ignite such intense and forbidden desire. When Eddie begins to deal with the unexpected effects of lactation, the discomfort quickly turns into something new – a need that awakens unfamiliar sensations.At first, it is just an innocent touch, a gesture of support. But when Buck notices the way Eddie reacts, their gazes linger, their touches become more lingering, and the tension between them becomes impossible to ignore. Between hesitant whispers and bodies seeking each other, they discover a shared pleasure that scares and excites them in equal measure.What began as a moment of vulnerability turns into an explosion of desire and connection. But are they ready to accept what this means for the relationship they have built? Between surrender and uncertainty, Buck and Eddie will discover that, sometimes, hunger goes far beyond what can be controlled.

entry.title: And somehow, I found my way back to you
entry.summary:
Author: mostly_luminous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,526Chapters: 8/10Kudos: 50

Summary: Evan Buckley hides his pain to avoid burdening others, always putting their needs first. Seen as strong and dependable, he silently struggles while earning praise for having it all together. But no one realizes the emotional cost of being the one everyone relies on—because he never shows how broken he really feels inside.And then, he just wants to stop. Maybe start something new. Somewhere far.So, he left... the 118, his sister, LA.... Eddie.And after 2 years, he still found his way to them........to him.

entry.title: we fell in love in october
entry.summary:
Author: lady_marshmall0w

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,116Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 2

Summary: A sigh severed the quietness. “Do you want kids?” Eddie asked curiously, though already assuming the answer.“Yeah. I mean, of course, I’ve always pictured myself having a family,” Buck paused before continuing, “Even if it’s not in the cards though, I’ll always have one kid,” he admitted, wearing the sweetest smile Eddie had ever seen, like teeth rottedly sweet. It made his heart skip a beat because Buck was talking about Christopher. He’d always be Chris’s family, obviously, so why was it setting Eddie’s skin ablaze thinking about it?-or-Eddie is having multiple realizations; he needs Christopher to come home, and he likes men, more specifically, one man.

entry.title: Hold Me Close, Let Me Forget
entry.summary:
Author: Madforyou

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,460Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 64

Summary: “Ohmygod,” he breathes out, eyes wide as he comes back to himself. He isn’t sure how long he has been staring into space, but when he looks at Buck he can see it’s been a minute.“Eddie what the hell is going on with you?” it comes out as a whisper, but his eyes shoot up to meet the blondes, concern etching Buck’s already sharp features.He isn’t sure what comes over him but the next minute he is pushing his best friend in the world out the door, ignoring his protests, saying they will talk later, and shutting the door in his face as he slides down it, head in his hands. Thoughts ruthlessly swirling in his mind as he races to make sense of the situation. Does he have feelings for Buck?or; Eddie and Buck hookup after getting too drunk at Chimney's bachelor party, Buck doesn't seem to remember and Eddie spirals about it.

entry.title: Death called to the wolf
entry.summary:
Author: shadowkatninjawarrior

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 104,987Chapters: 47/?Kudos: 1,003

Summary: Evan Buckley was intimately familiar with death. It hung in the air around him, lived under his skin.It was the reason he'd been born in the first place.Maybe it had seemed like some awful cosmic joke to his parents when they'd found out the source of his magic. It could have been anything.It just had to be death.Eddie Diaz doesn't know how to be a werewolf.Which is unfortunate, given he's been one all his life. He brought his son to LA to get away from it all, but he couldn't run from what he was.Or:Death Mage Buck and Werewolf Eddie find one another at the 118.

entry.title: He's the Air I Would Kill to Breathe
entry.summary:
Author: milowren

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,143Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 51

Summary: It’s only once they’re in the safety of Eddie’s living room with the front door closed behind them that Buck finally turns to him. “Why didn’t you tell me?”“Tell you what?” Eddie asks, continuing to avoid Buck’s gaze.Buck puts his hands on his hips, unimpressed. “Eddie. Come on.”Eddie sighs, dragging a hand through his still-damp hair. “Honestly? I didn’t think it really mattered.”Buck stares at him. “You didn’t think it mattered that you were the one who restarted my heart?” *** Buck finds out that Eddie was the one who restarted his heart after the lightning strike and gets a little bit obsessive about it.

entry.title: sweet like cinnamon
entry.summary:
Author: twobirdsonesong

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,550Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 60

Summary: “Do you think I look stupid?” Eddie twists in front of the mirror again, examining himself in the reflection. He’s wearing a black tank top with drop armholes, exposing the shadows of his ribs, the subtle curve of his pecs, the long flexing muscles of his lats. And, if he stretches the right way, a dusky flash of nipple. Across the chest of the tank is a black, white, purple, and gray rainbow. It’s not subtle and that’s the point. Buck peeks his head around the bathroom door. He grins when he sees Eddie, a flash of teeth. “You look hot.” or: Buck and Eddie go to their first WeHo Pride Parade together.

entry.title: Between his hand - Part. 1 - Attraction
entry.summary:
Author: 911_by_Jane

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,500Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 15

Summary: The contact of a glance, the burn of a touch, and... a dangerous game that pushes them a little closer to each other.After being abandoned by his girlfriend who ran off to Europe, Buck tries to piece himself back together. His broken heart no longer knows who to trust.When he saves the life of a child and his grandmother, he has no idea that this heroic act will change his own life. Because the child’s father, Eddie Diaz, isn’t like other men. Rich, charismatic, unpredictable… just one look from him is enough to shake all of Buck’s certainty.Buck has never been the type to submit. But in Eddie’s arms, another side of him wakes up—a side he didn’t even know existed.Until he discovers that the man who unsettles him, challenges him, and makes him come like no one else… is also the one who runs one of Los Angeles’s most powerful companies.And that their story might be more than just a game.I'm not very good to English, so please forgive any mistakes I didn't spot (there may be a lot.)

entry.title: darling, do you think that if I talk enough, I will make you wanna be mine
entry.summary:
Author: Elgney

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,045Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 523

Summary: “You know what they say,” Buck replied. “The way to a man’s heart is through his stomach. Isn’t that right, Eddie?”Bobby looked up, then, glancing back and forth between the two of them—Buck, giving Eddie his best lovesick puppy dog eyes, Eddie ignoring him. “What’s going on here?” he asked.“Oh, we’d need several psychologists to unpack that,” said Hen. “Maybe an anthropologist, too.”Next to her, Ravi grimaced and explained, “I said something stupid earlier, and now Buck has been flirting with Eddie all day, to drive us insane.”----Buck starts flirting with Eddie. As a joke, obviously.
